com.persistit
Class Management.TaskStatus

java.lang.Object
  com.persistit.Management.AcquisitionTimeBase
      com.persistit.Management.TaskStatus
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Enclosing interface:
Management
public static class Management.TaskStatus
extends Management.AcquisitionTimeBase
implements Serializable

Structure that describes the current status of a long-running utility task. See Management.queryTaskStatus(long, boolean, boolean) for further information.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getState

public int getState()
Return the state code for this task. This is one of
  • Task.STATE_NOT_STARTED
  • Task.STATE_RUNNING
  • Task.STATE_SUSPENDED
  • Task.STATE_DONE
  • Task.STATE_FAILED
  • Task.STATE_ENDED
  • Task.STATE_EXPIRED

Returns:
The state

getStateString

public String getStateString()
Return the name of the state this task is in. One of "notStarted", "running", "done", "suspended", "failed", "ended", or "expired".

Returns:
A readable name of the task's current state

getStatusSummary

public String getStatusSummary()
A short (under 40 character) readable String summarizing the current status.

Returns:
A short readable status
